comments.body:
> [@zerocrat](#comment-3-1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ):  No, this is a different Internet that needs to focus on p2p reliability 
> 3.0 decentralized.
> 

 @zerocrat

> [@paintninja](#comment-1-12EgeG4vgNHzuPJYZqVJQwy2W9vkywbQQu): I know this would defeat the purpose a bit, but it would be much more convenient if people could send emails to ZeroMail accounts through a proxy (for example: user@zeromail.proxyforzeronet.com).
> 
> Also, as cxgreat2014@zeroid.bit said, it would be great if we could send files in ZeroMail rather than just plain text!
> [@cxgreat2014](#comment-1-18hidquEH7k6Dnn5MDd4zJFJ2cTUF22wk2): I wish i can send files in my mail

> [@zerocrat](#comment-3-1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ):  No, this is a different Internet that needs to focus on p2p reliability 
> 3.0 decentralized.
>
> [@up4](#comment-2-1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz): i said: "something else" because the other ZeroNet mail system doesn't seem to work at all for me
